info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:44PM PDT until August 24 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 944 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms dissipated over Bunkerville and Mesquite prior to 9 pm PDT. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain were estimated to have fallen in the area. The threat of flash flooding is ongoing in nearby washes. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Riverside Road, Bunkerville and Mesquite. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
